Ethereum.iTagLine: EVMU is an index that tracks quality crypto token projects that are primarily focused for the Ethereum & EVM ecosystem
Ethereum.iDesc: EVM Universe Tracker Index (EVMU) is an index that tracks quality crypto token projects that are primarily focused for the Ethereum and EVM ecosystem. As one of the leading onchains in Crypto and Web3, EVM projects focus on next-generation applications and infrastructure being built in decentralised technology and Web3.
Ethereum.iMethodology:
The following criteria have been considered in the iMethodology and evaluation:

  • Tokens have been listed for at least 6 months
  • Tokens hold a marketCap of > $350M
  • Tokens offer an average daily on volume of > $20K on a decentralised exchange*
  • Tokens are not wrapped tokens
  • The weightage between tokens is > $100B is at least 20%
  • The weightage between remainder tokens is calculated based on weightage of market cap and liquidity on exchanges
  • Tokens closely track or a part of Ethereum‘s ecosystem
  • Tokens would be rebalanced quarterly
Ethereum.creator: AlphaGen

Ethereum.iTagLine: DFI is composed of the top eight DeFi tokens in the Ethereum ecosystem by market capitalization.
Ethereum.iDesc: Amun’s DeFi Index Token (DFI) is composed of the top eight DeFi tokens in the Ethereum ecosystem by market capitalization. DFI provides investors with exposure to protocols that provide trading, lending and borrowing, yield farming, data oracles, insurance, prediction markets, and synthetic assets.
Ethereum.iMethodology: The index queries the CoinGecko API for the list of top DeFi protocols by market capitalization. Non-Ethereum based protocols, stablecoins, and synthetic assets are excluded from the list. The top eight protocols are selected and equally weighted in the index. The index is rebalanced monthly to include any new tokens and redistribute weights. When DFI tokens are burned, the owner receives the equivalent amount of constituent tokens.
Ethereum.creator: Amun

Ethereum.iTagLine: DPI is a capitalization-weighted index that tracks the performance of decentralized financial assets across the market
Ethereum.iDesc: The DeFi Pulse Index is a capitalization-weighted index that tracks the performance of decentralized financial assets across the market.
Ethereum.iMethodology: The DeFi Pulse Index is a digital asset index designed to track the performance of some of the largest protocols in the Decentralized Finance (DeFi) space. DeFi is a blockchain-based implementation of traditional financial services that does not rely on central intermediaries and instead uses smart contracts on blockchains.
Ethereum.creator: Defi Pulse

Solana.iTagLine: SOLU is an index  that tracks quality crypto token projects that are primarily focused for the Solana ecosystem
Solana.iDesc: Solana Universe Index (SOLU) is an index  that tracks quality crypto token projects that are primarily focused for the Solana ecosystem. As one of the leading onchains in Crypto and Web3, EVM projects focus on next-generation applications and infrastructure being built in decentralised technology and Web3.
Solana.iMethodology:
The following criteria have been considered in the iMethodology and evaluation:

  • Tokens have been listed for at least 6 months
  • Tokens hold a marketCap of > $350M
  • Tokens offer an average daily on volume of > $20K on a decentralised exchange*
  • Tokens are not wrapped tokens
  • The weightage between tokens is > $100B is at least 20%
  • The weightage between remainder tokens is calculated based on weightage of market cap and liquidity on exchanges
  • Tokens closely track or a part of Ethereum‘s ecosystem
  • Tokens would be rebalanced quarterly
Solana.creator: AlphaGen

Solana.iTagLine: SOLI provides holders with a weighted index containing Solana Native tokens & Staked SOL for users to gain diversified exposure to the Solana Ecosystem
Solana.iDesc: Amun’s Solana Ecosystem Index (SOLI) is composed of the top tokens in the Solana ecosystem, and is built to contain up to 10 constituents. Consisting of 33% mSol, SOLI gives holders an alternative to only holding Sol and instead gives them a token that grows with the entire ecosystem while generating yield from the staked Marinade Sol.
Solana.iMethodology: Constituents are rebalanced on a monthly basis and included in the index if they meet Amun’s inclusion criteria. To be included in the index, tokens must be 1) a Solana native project 2) gaining organic adoption in liquidity and market cap 3) listed on Raydium with single pool liquidity over $3M. After reserving 33% of the index for mSol, the allocation percentage for each constituent is calculated based on a weighted average ratio of market capitalization and DEX liquidity. Amun identifies Solana native projects as those that have a majority of their TVL on Solana.
Solana.creator: Amun

Polygon.iTagLine: POL is an index  that tracks quality crypto token projects that are primarily focused for the Polygon ecosystem
Polygon.iDesc: Polygon Universe Index (POL) is an index  that tracks quality crypto token projects that are primarily focused for the Polygon ecosystem. As one of the leading onchains in Crypto and Web3, EVM projects focus on next-generation applications and infrastructure being built in decentralised technology and Web3.
Polygon.iMethodology:
The following criteria have been considered in the methodology and evaluation::

  • Tokens have been listed for at least 6 months
  • Tokens hold a marketCap of > $350M
  • Tokens offer an average daily on volume of > $20K on a decentralised exchange*
  • Tokens are not wrapped tokens
  • The weightage between tokens is > $100B is at least 20%
  • The weightage between remainder tokens is calculated based on weightage of market cap and liquidity on exchanges
  • Tokens closely track or a part of Ethereum‘s ecosystem
  • Tokens would be rebalanced quarterly.
Polygon.creator: AlphaGen

Polygon.iTagLine: Bullish on the Polygon Ecosystem? Whether you’re a Polygon native or 100% on Ethereum, our PECO token gives you exposure to the best projects on Polygon.
Polygon.iDesc: Amun’s Polygon Ecosystem Index (PECO) is composed of the top tokens in the Polygon ecosystem. PECO provides investors with exposure to the leading projects in the Polygon ecosystem through either a Polygon native token or an Ethereum token tied to the Polygon assets. Consisting of 50% Matic, PECO gives holders an alternative to only holding Matic and instead gives them a token that grows with the entire ecosystem, not just the base token. Given Polygon’s low transaction fees and growing ecosystem, we believe that PECO can grow to include a large number of constituents so long as they satisfy Amun’s inclusion criteria.
Polygon.iMethodology:
Constituents are rebalanced on a monthly basis and included in the index if they meet Amun’s inclusion criteria.

To be included in the index, tokens must be:
  1. Native to the Polygon network and contribute to the Polygon ecosystem
  2. Launched on Polygon over 2 months prior
  3. Gaining organic adoption in liquidity and market cap
  4. Listed on Quickswap and DFYN with liquidity over $5M.

After reserving 50% of the index for Matic, the allocation percentage for each constituent is calculated based on a weighted average ratio of market capitalization and DEX liquidity.
Polygon.creator: Amun

Polygon.iTagLine: The BTC 2x Flexible Leverage Index on Polygon (BTC2x-FLI-P) lets you leverage a collateralized debt position in a safe and efficient way, by abstracting its management into a simple index.
Polygon.iDesc: The BTC 2x Flexible Leverage Index on Polygon (BTC2x-FLI-P) lets you leverage a collateralized debt position in a safe and efficient way, by abstracting its management into a simple index. It enables market participants to take on leverage while minimizing the transaction costs and risks associated with maintaining collateralized debt. BTC2x-FLI-P targets a long 2x exposure to BTC and employs a flexible leverage mechanism for optimal rebalancing outcomes.
Polygon.creator: IndexCoop

Polygon.iTagLine: The Inverse BTC Flexible Leverage Index on Polygon (iBTC-FLI-P) lets you leverage a collateralized debt position in a safe and efficient way, by abstracting its management into a simple index.
Polygon.iDesc: The Inverse BTC Flexible Leverage Index on Polygon (iBTC-FLI-P) lets you leverage a collateralized debt position in a safe and efficient way, by abstracting its management into a simple index. It enables market participants to take on leverage while minimizing the transaction costs and risks associated with maintaining collateralized debt. iBTC-FLI-P targets a short -1x exposure to BTC and employs a flexible leverage mechanism for optimal rebalancing outcomes.
Polygon.creator: IndexCoop

Near.iTagLine: NECO is an index that tracks quality crypto token projects that are primarily focused on the NEAR ecosystem
Near.iDesc: NEAR Ecosystem Tracker Index (NECO) is an index that tracks quality crypto token projects that are primarily focused on the NEAR ecosystem. As one of the leading upcoming chains in Crypto and Web3, NEAR projects focus on next-generation applications and infrastructure being built in decentralized technology and Web3.
Near.iMethodology:
The following criteria have been considered in the iMethodology and evaluation:

  • Tokens have been listed for at least 3 months
  • Tokens hold a marketCap of > $1.25M
  • The weightage of tokens > $10M is at least 25%
  • The weightage between remainder tokens is calculated based on weightage of market cap and liquidity on exchanges
  • Tokens closely track or a part of NEAR’ s ecosystem.
  • Rebalancing tokens: Monthly
Near.creator: AlphaGen

Bitcoin.iDesc: Multicoin Tracker Index (MCVC) is an index basket that tracks portfolio companies that are invested by Multicoin Capital. As one of the leading VCs in Crypto and Web3, Multicoin’s investment thesis focuses next-generation applications and infrastructure being built in decentralised technology and Web3
Bitcoin.iMethodology:
The following criteria have been considered in the methodology and evaluation:

  • Tokens have been listed for at least 6 months
  • Tokens hold a marketCap of > $4.5 Million
  • Tokens offer an average daily on volume of > on a centralised exchange*
  • Tokens are not wrapped tokens
  • The weightage between tokens is > $4B is at least 50%
  • The weightage between remainder tokens is calculated based on equal weightage on market cap and liquidity on exchanges
  • Tokens closely track or a part of Multicoin Capital VC‘s investment thesis
  • Tokens would be rebalanced quarterly
Bitcoin.creator: AlphaGen
